homeSubtitle: Hi there! Welcome to my website! I use this website mainly to show recruiters my skills and contact information. I hope you'll enjoy your stay here. I'd give you some cookies but I respect your privacy, so maybe another time?
aboutMeText: I'm a creative guy that loves making new solutions to old things. I love learning new things and I've liked computers, phones and networking ever since I was a child. I'm always up-to-date about their software and hardware. I even like modifying electronics to do new things, like old cables and accessories like iPods and I know a bunch of languages too!
techText: I own a bunch of different tech. Here are my most important ones:
computerDevice:
AMD Ryzen 5 3600
ASUS Radeon RX6700 XT OC Edition
16GB RAM
